declarations.description: Lightweight emoji picker distributed as a web component
declarations.name: Picker

attributes.name: data-source
attributes.description: URL to fetch the emoji data from

attributes.name: skin-tone-emoji
attributes.description: The emoji to use for the skin tone picker

members.name: dataSource
members.description: URL to fetch the emoji data from

members.name: skinToneEmoji
members.description: The emoji to use for the skin tone picker

members.name: customCategorySorting
members.description: Function to sort custom category strings (sorted alphabetically by default)

events.name: skin-tone-change
events.description: This event is fired whenever the user selects a new skin tone.

events.name: emoji-click
events.description: The `emoji-click` event is fired when an emoji is selected by the user.

cssProperties.name: --background
cssProperties.description: Background of the entire `<emoji-picker>` (default: `#fff`, dark default: `#222`)

cssProperties.name: --border-color
cssProperties.description: (default: `#e0e0e0`, dark default: `#444`)

cssProperties.name: --border-size
cssProperties.description: Width of border used in most of the picker (default: `1px`)

cssProperties.name: --button-active-background
cssProperties.description: Background of an active button (default: `#e6e6e6`, dark default: `#555555`)

cssProperties.name: --button-hover-background
cssProperties.description: Background of a hovered button (default: `#d9d9d9`, dark default: `#484848`)

cssProperties.name: --category-emoji-padding
cssProperties.description: Vertical/horizontal padding on category emoji, if you want it to be different from `--emoji-padding` (default: `var(--emoji-padding)`)

cssProperties.name: --category-emoji-size
cssProperties.description: Width/height of category emoji, if you want it to be different from `--emoji-size` (default: `var(--emoji-size)`)

cssProperties.name: --category-font-color
cssProperties.description: Font color of custom emoji category headings (default: `#111`, dark default: `#efefef`)

cssProperties.name: --category-font-size
cssProperties.description: Font size of custom emoji category headings (default: `1rem`)

cssProperties.name: --emoji-padding
cssProperties.description: Vertical and horizontal padding on emoji (default: `0.5rem`)

cssProperties.name: --emoji-size
cssProperties.description: Width and height of all emoji (default: `1.375rem`)

cssProperties.name: --indicator-color
cssProperties.description: Color of the nav indicator (default: `#385ac1`, dark default: `#5373ec`)

cssProperties.name: --indicator-height
cssProperties.description: Height of the nav indicator (default: `3px`)

cssProperties.name: --input-border-color
cssProperties.description: (default: `#999`, dark default: `#ccc`)

cssProperties.name: --input-border-radius
cssProperties.description: (default: `0.5rem`)

cssProperties.name: --input-border-size
cssProperties.description: (default: `1px`)

cssProperties.name: --input-font-color
cssProperties.description: (default: `#111`, dark default: `#efefef`)

cssProperties.name: --input-font-size
cssProperties.description: (default: `1rem`)

cssProperties.name: --input-line-height
cssProperties.description: (default: `1.5`)

cssProperties.name: --input-padding
cssProperties.description: (default: `0.25rem`)

cssProperties.name: --input-placeholder-color
cssProperties.description: (default: `#999`, dark default: `#ccc`)

cssProperties.name: --num-columns
cssProperties.description: How many columns to display in the emoji grid (default: `8`)

cssProperties.name: --outline-color
cssProperties.description: Focus outline color (default: `#999`, dark default: `#fff`)

cssProperties.name: --outline-size
cssProperties.description: Focus outline width (default: `2px`)

cssProperties.name: --skintone-border-radius
cssProperties.description: Border radius of the skintone dropdown (default: `1rem`)
